name: process_constructions_unfinished_basement

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedufbsmt
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the unfinished basement

arguments.name: selectedufbsmtins
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement insulation type

arguments.name: selectedstudsize
arguments.display_name: Wood stud size of wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedufbsmtwallceilcav
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement whole wall or ceiling cavity insulationFor manually entering unfinished basement whole wall or ceiling cavity insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedufbsmtwallceilcavr
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement whole wall cavity insulation or ceiling cavity insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedinstallgrade
arguments.display_name: Insulation installation grade of wood stud wall cavity

arguments.name: selectedinsfills
arguments.display_name: Cavity insulation fills the cavity

arguments.name: selectedufbsmtwallcont
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement wall continuous insulationFor manually entering unfinished basement wall continuous insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedufbsmtwallcontth
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement wall continuous insulation thickness

arguments.name: userdefinedufbsmtwallcontr
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement wall continuous insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedufbsmtceiljoistheight
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement ceiling joist height

arguments.name: userdefinedufbsmtceilff
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement ceiling framing factor

arguments.name: selectedufbsmtrimjoist
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement rim joist insulationFor manually entering unfinished basement rim joist insulation properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedufbsmtrimjoistr
arguments.display_name: Unfinished basement rim joist insulation R-value

arguments.name: selectedfloormass
arguments.display_name: Floor massFor manually entering floor mass properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormassth
arguments.display_name: Floor mass thickness

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormasscond
arguments.display_name: Floor mass conductivity

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormassdens
arguments.display_name: Floor mass density

arguments.name: userdefinedfloormasssh
arguments.display_name: Floor mass specific heat

arguments.name: selectedcarpet
arguments.display_name: CarpetFor manually entering carpet properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedcarpetr
arguments.display_name: Carpet pad R-value

arguments.name: userdefinedcarpetfrac
arguments.display_name: Carpet floor fraction

modeler_description: Calculates material layer properties of constructions for the unfinished basement ceiling, walls, floor, and rim joists. Finds surfaces adjacent to the unfinished basement and sets applicable constructions.
description: This measure creates constructions for the unfinished basement ceiling, walls, floor, and rim joists.
